## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                                            | Type                         | Default        |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------- | -------------- |
| `activeStepId` | `active-step-id` | stepId of the currently active step.                   | `string`                     | `undefined`    |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`       |                                                        | `boolean`                    | `false`        |
| `orientation`  | `orientation`    | Specifies horizontal or vertical orientation of steps. | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"` | `'horizontal'` |

| Event                 | Description | Type                  |
| --------------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `guxactivestepchange` |             | `CustomEvent<string>` |
